hero.name:
Hi,
I'm Jules
hero.presentation:
I'm a full-stack developer
based in Paris, France.

about.description: Passionate about IT since I was child, I discover web developping about 1 year ago and I immediately enjoy it and study it. I started with an apprentenship of 1 year in a company but my desire to create website from scratch make me want to launch myself into freelance. In September I will begin a new cursus at 42' school to develop my skills in computer science.
about.technologies:
These are the
technologies I've been using

projects.title: My projects
projects.description1: The company wanted to develop a website that would allow users to find accommodations and activities in the city of their choice.
projects.description2: Sophie Buel, a space designer, wanted a dynamic showcase website to show her works and creations.
projects.description3: For this project, it was about optimizing, debugging and modernizing the website of Nina Carducci, a professional photographer.
projects.description4: Kasa, a company that rents apartments between individuals, wanted to completely redesign their website with up-to-date technologies.
projects.description5: Mon Vieux Grimoire a small chain of bookstores that wanted to open a book referencing and rating site, For this site I only took care of the back-end part.
